roleset.name: to divide
roleset.note: PARTITION-V NOTES: Frames file for "partition" loosely based on "disassemble" and "divide"framesets. (from partition.01-v predicate notes)
PARTITION-N NOTES: Based on sentences in nouns-00040. Comparison to partition.01-v. VN class disassemble-23.3. FN class seperating. Framed by Katie. (from partition.01-n)

role.descr: divided into what, end state, oblique

example.name: with end state
example.text: The viceroy partitioned the territory into four large sections.

example.name: with source
example.text: The teacher partitioned the unruly child from the rest.

example.name: arg 1 only
example.text: nor will there be any partition of Lebanon
